data.message: This is really cool, for some reason, it makes me think of this Eminem in a rap battle against Slim Shady, with the bleach blond hair and clean shaven.  In some kind of alternate universe rap battle against his own alter-ego.  I can see a really cool video in my mind for this.  Split screen ya know.  I dunno, I'm just vibing...  Trying to be creative.  Slim Shady vs Eminem rap battle 2020 !
